DOC.brief_summary: The B7441003 study assess PF-06412562 motor benefit Parkinson 's disease subject . Safety , tolerability PK PF-06412562 Parkinson 's disease subject also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety And Tolerability Study In Subjects With Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Male female subject diagnosis idiopathic Parkinson 's disease . Daily Ldopa dose 300 1200 mg. MBRS score > 1 . Surgical intervention Parkinson 's disease . History troublesome dyskinesia . Any significant AXIS I psychiatric disease .
